name: Feather Fighters
description:
Our project for Mini Jam 99: Birds. The game itself isn't completed, not by a long run, but hey, we at least got something.

the main failure is because of our team management, the team consists of 7 people but failed miserably at managing, there's no leader, and everyone except  @CXRedix, @taterpix17, and @CH51 works towards the end, other people just disappeared from existence XD
